üí° How to Use

This test plugin demonstrates the advanced overlay windows component capabilities:

  • Create Windows: Click "Open Example Window" to create overlay windows
  • Move Windows: Use the position control buttons to move windows
  • Resize Windows: Use the size control buttons to resize windows
  • Close Windows: Use the "Close" buttons in this control panel

Important: Alt1 overlays are visual-only and cannot receive mouse clicks directly. Use the control buttons in this panel to interact with windows.

Windows are created using: windowManager.createWindow(config)
